title: RA Sushi serves signature rolls including Viva Las Vegas and RA'ckin' Roll
statement: RA Sushi's menu includes signature sushi rolls named Viva Las Vegas and RA'ckin' Roll among their offerings.

citations.quote: Explore signature rolls like Viva Las Vegas and "RA"ckin' Roll with sashimi and nigiri, served in our fun and lively atmosphere.
